external_games.name: Ashanti Protocol: Unmanned Peacekeepers Amidst a Tempest of Conflict

name: Ashanti Protocol: Unmanned Peacekeepers Amidst a Tempest of Conflict
storyline:
Major Weylin joins unmanned vehicle command and starts with easy mission to master controls of unmanned cannon. Under guidance of Colonel Arya and support of Major Gawin missions are handled from control room of unmanned vehicle command. Choose suitable ammo for your mission. try to save space for lighter air drop.

High level description of tasks includes: select ammunition, shoot cannon to demolish, shoot the suitable ammo type, Every level has variety of multiple tasks like physics puzzles, hit and search, explosions etc.

After mastering cannon, Major Weylin gets charge of unmanned car with cannon. Tasks includes: select ammunition, drive car & shoot, shoot the suitable ammo type. players will experience exploration, chase enemy, chased by enemy, covert missions and much more.
